statements: SELECT * FROM Contributions;
SELECT donor_id, amount FROM Contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_id, amount, contribution_date FROM Contributions WHERE donor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT donor_id, amount FROM Contributions WHERE contribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_contributions FROM Contributions;
SELECT * FROM Contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY contribution_date DESC
SELECT donor_id, amount FROM Contributions WHERE contribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Contributions WHERE donor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY contribution_date ASC
SELECT donor_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Contributions GROUP BY donor_id HAVING total_amount > 2000
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_contributions FROM Contributions WHERE contribution_date >= '2022-03-01'
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, SUM(amount) FROM contributions GROUP BY donor_id;
SELECT id, name, email FROM donors WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY name;
SELECT date, amount FROM contributions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, donor_id, amount FROM contributions WHERE donor_id = 5
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE name LIKE '%Sarah%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM contributions WHERE donor_id = 3 GROUP BY donor_id
SELECT id, name, address FROM donors WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM Contributions;
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM Contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, contribution_date FROM Contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM Donors WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT donor_id, amount FROM Contributions WHERE donor_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM Contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, SUM(amount) AS total_contribution FROM Contributions GROUP BY donor_name HAVING total_contribution > 5000;
SELECT r.receipt_id, d.donor_name, c.amount FROM Receipts r JOIN Donors d ON r.donor_id = d.donor_id JOIN Contributions c ON r.contribution_id = c.id WHERE c.amount < 500;
SELECT d.donor_name, r.total_amount FROM Donors d LEFT JOIN Receipts r ON d.donor_id = r.donor_id WHERE r.total_amount IS NULL;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM Donors WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM contributions;
SELECT id, donor_id, amount, date FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM contributions GROUP BY donor_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT id, donor_id, contribution_id, date FROM history ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donors.name, contributions.amount FROM donors JOIN contributions ON donors.id = contributions.donor_id WHERE donors.name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY contributions.amount DESC;
SELECT donors.name AS donor_name, SUM(contributions.amount) AS total_amount FROM donors JOIN contributions ON donors.id = contributions.donor_id GROUP BY donors.name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT contributions.amount, COUNT(*) AS donation_count FROM donations GROUP BY contributions.amount HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY donation_count DESC;

SELECT donors.name, SUM(contributions.amount) AS total_amount, COUNT(*) AS donation_count FROM donors JOIN contributions ON donors.id = contributions.donor_id GROUP BY donors.name HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM contributions;
SELECT donor_id, amount FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT receipt_date, amount_received FROM receipts WHERE receipt_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM address WHERE state='CA';
SELECT * FROM contributions ORDER BY contribution_id DESC;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT contribution_id, amount, contribution_date FROM contributions WHERE donor_id = 3 AND amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM receipts WHERE receipt_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT donor_name, amount_deducted FROM donors d INNER JOIN tax_deductions td ON d.donor_id = td.donor_id
